english.segment1: Lift up your head. Eyes off the floor. Your time is coming. Right after this storm. Don't be afraid. Of what lies ahead. It's destiny callin'. Where you've never been
english.segment2: How deep is soul?. How strong can one heart be?. It's never too late
english.segment3: While we're still breathing. It's never too late. While we're still breathing. It's never too late
english.segment4: Don't close your eyes. The best part is coming. The strength of tomorrow. Meets the power of now. Contentment is art. Contentment is answer. Now be still my heart. As you learn to love
english.segment5: How deep is soul?. How strong can one heart be?. It's never too late
english.segment6: While we're still breathing. It's never too late. While we're still breathing. It's never too late
english.segment7: How deep is soul?. How strong can one heart be?. How deep is soul?. How strong can your heart be?. No it's never too late
english.segment8: While we're still breathing. It's never too late. While we're still breathing. It's never too late
